DefaultEvent.Description: Water drips into the cargo hold, the engine screams in protest, and most of the guns are too rusted over to fire. Still, she's ready to sail, if treated gently.
DefaultEvent.Name: $Venderbight -> ヴェンダーバイト$Ship-shape, Venderbight fashion

ChildBranches.Name: Repair the Nocturne
ChildBranches.Description: These supplies and a little zailor ingenuity will have her ready for the trip in no time.

DefaultEvent.Description: Bringing supplies was wise. A good book might have been wiser.
DefaultEvent.Name: The wake barely disturbs the zee

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Things seem calm. So why is there an increasingly unspoken fear that something is coming?
RareDefaultEvent.Name: The wake barely disturbs the zee

ChildBranches.Name: Slow sailing
ChildBranches.Description: If you didn't know better, you'd think you weren't even moving.

DefaultEvent.Description: For now, at least. Wrapped in fresh bandages to cover his hollow eyes and his borrowed clothes hanging off his emaciated arms, he looks like the kind of corpse even a tomb colonist would think twice to be seen with. Being in his old cabin however does appear to be soothing what pain the wine cannot. He will be ready, if trouble strikes.
DefaultEvent.Name: His body is broken, but his mind remains sharp

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Wrapped in fresh bandages to cover his hollow eyes and with borrowed clothes hanging off his emaciated arms, he looks like the kind of corpse even a tomb colonist would think twice to be seen with. When it comes to his ship though, his mind is still firm. He will be a great help should things go awry.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: He murmurs of a dream of tortures not yet complete

ChildBranches.Name: A moment's reflection
ChildBranches.Description: The Former Captain of the Nocturne sits in his one-time cabin, remembering the taste of mushroom wine.

DefaultEvent.Description:
"The spiders- the duplicitous spiders will pay their due - " he whispers, nails digging deep enough into his skull to draw blood. "Abandon the vessel. Absolve yourself in the depths. This shall be your only... your only warn - "

He collapses, unconscious. Outside, a heavy wave sends the Nocturne rolling. The cracking of its hastily patched hull echoes as it strains to keep out the water.
DefaultEvent.Name: A terror from the deep

RareDefaultEvent.Description:
"The spiders - the duplicitous spiders will pay their due - " she whispers, nails digging deep enough into her skull to draw blood. "Abandon the vessel. Absolve yourself in the depths. This shall be your only... your only warn - "

She collapses, unconscious. Outside, a heavy wave sends the Nocturne rolling. The cracking of its hastily patched hull echoes as it strains to keep out the water.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: A terror from the deep

ChildBranches.Name: A crew member screams in agony
ChildBranches.Description: It echoes through the empty corridors.

DefaultEvent.Name: There is no talking it down.

ChildBranches.Name: A monster from the depths!
ChildBranches.Description: $Lorn-Fluke -> ローエン・フルーク, Fluke -> フルーク$It rises, the Avaricious Lorn-Fluke. Encrusted with weeds and long-forgotten treasures, it heads towards the Nocturne with a singular purpose.

DefaultEvent.Description: He shuffles to the engine room, still shivering.
DefaultEvent.Name: "Shadow, cap'n. Just a sha... Won't happen again."

RareDefaultEvent.Description: She shuffles to the engine room, still shivering.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: "Shadow, cap'n. Just a sha... Won't happen again."

ChildBranches.Name: A crewman yelps in sudden fright

SuccessEvent.Description: How long has that been there? You squint, but it dives beneath the waves too quickly to identify. Perhaps it was never even there at all.
SuccessEvent.Name: A dark shape far away

DefaultEvent.Description: No, it's nothing. Or not something to worry about anyway. Perhaps the ripples of a fallen stalactite.
DefaultEvent.Name: Was that something moving, out in the dark?

RareDefaultEvent.Description: Just the friendly lingering terror of the zee. Occasionally, a half-heard echo of somebody else's problems far away. A few relaxing moments to savour.
RareDefaultEvent.Name: All is quiet

ChildBranches.Name: Look out to the zee
ChildBranches.Description: The Nocturne's lights are low, but the creatures of the zee can see even tiny glimmers without squinting.

SuccessEvent.Description: It won't hold, but it doesn't have to. Not for long.
SuccessEvent.Name: A swift, efficient repair

DefaultEvent.Description: There's still a drip, but it's under control.
DefaultEvent.Name: A basic patch job

ChildBranches.Name: A leak in the cargo bay!

Description: $Saviour's Rocks -> 救い主の岩礁, Fallen London -> フォールン・ロンドン$You'd never get her back to Fallen London, but she might just survive the trip to Saviour's Rocks.
Name: The Final Voyage of the Nocturne
